title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.25 - Amendment of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.25 - Amendment of petition

State Regulations
(a) A
petitioner may file an amended petition without the Board's permission at any
time prior to service of a response to the petition. Thereafter, a petition may
only be amended with the Board's permission. (b) Unless otherwise directed, an amended
petition will be served by the Board in the same manner as set forth at section
65.21
of these rules, a response
to an amended petition, if any, must be made in the same manner as set forth at
section
65.22
of these rules, and a reply
to an answer to an amended petition, if any, must be made in the same manner as
set forth at section
65.23
of these rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.25

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
